Verses: 1 idharkuppinbu, Dhaaveedhu Pelistharai Muriya Adiththu, Avargalaik Keezhppaduththi, Kaadh Pattanaththaiyum Adhin Graamangalaiyum Pelistharin Kaiyilirundhu Pidiththukkondaan.
2 avan Movaabiyaraiyum Muriyadiththadhinaal, Movaabiyar Dhaaveedhai Seviththu Avanukkuk Kaanikkaigalai Seluththinaargal.
3 sobaavin Raajaavaagiya Aadhaaresar Aipiraadh Nadhiyandaiyil Than Raanuvaththai Niruththappogirapodhu, Dhaaveedhu Avanaiyum Aamaaththin Kitte Muriya Adiththaan.

4 avanukku Irundha Aayiram Radhangalaiyum Ezhaayiram Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Irubadhinaayiram Kaalaatkalaiyum Pidiththu, Radhangalil Nooru Radhangalaiyum Vaiththukkondu, Matravaigalaiyellaam Thundaadippottaan.
5 sobaavin Raajaavaagiya Aadhaaresarukku Udhaviseyya Thamaskupattanaththaaraagiya Seeriyar Vandhaargal; Dhaaveedhu Seeriyaril Irubaththeeraayiramperai Vettippottu,

6 thamaskuvukkaduththa Seeriyaavile Thaanaiyangalai Vaiththaan; Seeriyar Dhaaveedhai Seviththu Avanukkuk Kaanikkaigalai Seluththinaargal; Dhaaveedhu Pona Idaththilellaam Karththar Avanaik Kaappaatrinaar.
7 aadhaaresarin Sevagarukku Irundha Pon Parisaigalai Dhaaveedhu Eduththu, Avaigalai Erusalemukkuk Konduvandhaan.

8 aadhaaresarin Pattanangalaagiya Thipkaaththilum Koonilumirundhu Dhaaveedhu Vegu Thiralaana Venkalaththaiyum Eduththukkonduvandhaan; Adhinaale Saalomon Venkalak Kadalthottiyaiyum Thoongalaiyum Venkalath Thattumuttugalaiyum Undaakkinaan.
9 dhaaveedhu Sobaavin Raajaavaagiya Aadhaaresarin Raanuvaththaiyellaam Muriya Adiththa Seydhiyai Aamaaththin Raajaavaagiya Thoyoo Kettapodhu,

10 avan Dhaaveedhu Raajaavin Sugaseydhiyai Visaarikkavum, Avan Aadhaaresarodu Yuththampanni, Avanai Muriya Adiththadharkaaga Avanukku Vinavudhal Sollavum, Than Kumaaranaagiya Adhoraamaiyum, Ponnum Velliyum Venkalamumaana Sagalavidhath Thattumuttugalaiyum, Avanidaththukku Anuppinaan; Aadhaaresar Thoyoovinmel Yuththampannugiravanaayirundhaan.

11 andhath Thattumuttugalaiyum, Thaan Edhomiyar, Movaabiyar, Ammon Puththirar, Pelisthar, Amalekkiyar Ennum Sagala Jaadhigalin Kaiyilum Vaangina Velliyaiyum, Ponnaiyumkooda Dhaaveedhuraajaa Karththarukkup Parisuththamendru Nerndhukondaan.
12 seruyaavin Kumaaran Abisaayi Uppup Pallaththaakkile Padhinennaayiram Edhomiyarai Muriya Adiththaan.
13 aagaiyaal Dhaaveedhu Edhomile Thaanaiyam Pottaan; Edhomiyar Ellaarum Avanai Sevikkiravargalaanaargal; Dhaaveedhu Pona Idaththilellaam Karththaravanaik Kaappaatrinaar.
14 dhaaveedhu Isravelaiyellaam Aandu, Thannudaiya Janaththirkellaam Nyaayamum Needhiyum Seydhaan.
15 seruyaavin Kumaaran Yovaab Raanuvaththalaivanaayirundhaan; Aagiloodhin Kumaaranaagiya Yosabaadh Mandhiriyaayirundhaan.
16 agidhoopin Kumaaran Saadhokkum, Abiyaththaarin Kumaaran Abimelekkum Aasaariyaraayirundhaargal; Savishaa Sambiradhiyaayirundhaan.
17 yoidhaavin Kumaaran Penaayaa Kireththiyarukkum Pileththiyarukkum Thalaivanaayirundhaan; Dhaaveedhin Puththirar Raajaavinidaththil Pradhaanigalaayirundhaargal.
